author: Special Correspondent
text: Chief Minister N. Rangasamy on Sunday announced that special Pongal gift packs containing essential commodities worth Rs.309 would be distributed to all the cardholders in the Union Territory in a day or two through all outlets of Public Distribution System. Last week he said the gift packs containing 1 kg of raw rice and sugar and half-a-kg of toor dhal, urad dhal, jaggery and green gram would be distributed to cardholders. On Monday, in addition to those essentials, Chief Minister said dry grapes, cashew and cardamom would be provided.
title: Pongal gift for family card holders
